extendedInfo.description: Data ON / OFF it is a simple widget, using which you can enable or disable the data transmission  on your phone or tablet.After installation the application, add the widget to your desktop. Clear instructions, how to add the widget is inside the application.Widget has two position:ON - data transmission enabledOFF - data transmission disabledNow you don't have to look in the settings, you can one tap enable or disable data transmission.With this application Data on / off you can save battery power and easily manage data traffic costs.Enjoy your use.If something in your application is not working properly, or you have ideas how we can improve it, mail to us: apps@examobile.comIf you like this application, share this information on our profile:Google https://plus.google.com/s/examobileFacebook https://pl-pl.facebook.com/ExaMobile

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: The widget took a ling to appear in my phone. But it works good.
reviews.author: Balasubramaniam Karthik
